rank_lt_aleph_0:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/-- The dimension of a noetherian module over a division ring, as a cardinal,
is strictly less than the first infinite cardinal `ℵ₀`. -/
theorem rank_lt_aleph_0 : ∀ [IsNoetherian K V], Module.rank K V < cardinal.aleph_0 :=
  IsNoetherian.iff_rank_lt_aleph0.1
#align rank_lt_aleph_0 rank_lt_aleph_0
range_finset_basis:
@[simp]
theorem range_finset_basis [IsNoetherian K V] : Set.range (finsetBasis K V) = Basis.ofVectorSpaceIndex K V := by
  rw [finset_basis, Basis.range_reindex, Basis.range_ofVectorSpace]
#align range_finset_basis range_finset_basis
iff_rank_lt_aleph_0:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `cardinal.aleph_0 -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2019 Chris Hughes. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Chris Hughes
-/
/-- A module over a division ring is noetherian if and only if
its dimension (as a cardinal) is strictly less than the first infinite cardinal `ℵ₀`.
-/
theorem iff_rank_lt_aleph_0 : IsNoetherian K V ↔ Module.rank K V < cardinal.aleph_0 :=
  by
  let b := Basis.ofVectorSpace K V
  rw [← b.mk_eq_rank'', lt_aleph_0_iff_set_finite]
  constructor
  · intro
    exact finite_of_linearIndependent (Basis.ofVectorSpaceIndex.linearIndependent K V)
  · intro hbfinite
    refine' @isNoetherian_of_linearEquiv K («expr⊤» : Submodule K V) V _ _ _ _ _ (LinearEquiv.ofTop _ rfl) (id _)
    refine' isNoetherian_of_fg_of_noetherian _ ⟨Set.Finite.toFinset hbfinite, _⟩
    rw [Set.Finite.coe_toFinset, ← b.span_eq, Basis.coe_ofVectorSpace, Subtype.range_coe]
#align iff_rank_lt_aleph_0 iff_rank_lt_aleph_0
iff_fg:
/-- A module over a division ring is noetherian if and only if it is finitely generated. -/
theorem iff_fg : IsNoetherian K V ↔ Module.Finite K V :=
  by
  constructor
  · intro h
    exact
      ⟨⟨finset_basis_index K V, by
          convert(finset_basis K V).span_eq
          simp⟩⟩
  · rintro ⟨s, hs⟩
    rw [IsNoetherian.iff_rank_lt_aleph0, ← rank_top, ← hs]
    exact lt_of_le_of_lt (rank_span_le _) s.finite_to_set.lt_aleph_0
#align iff_fg iff_fg
finite_basis_index:
/-- In a noetherian module over a division ring,
if a basis is indexed by a set, that set is finite. -/
theorem finite_basis_index {ι : Type _} {s : Set ι} [IsNoetherian K V] (b : Basis s K V) : s.finite :=
  b.finite_index_of_rank_lt_aleph_0 (rank_lt_aleph0 K V)
#align finite_basis_index finite_basis_index
coe_sort_finset_basis_index:
@[simp]
theorem coe_sort_finset_basis_index [IsNoetherian K V] :
    (finsetBasisIndex K V : Type _) = Basis.ofVectorSpaceIndex K V :=
  Set.Finite.coeSort_toFinset _
#align coe_sort_finset_basis_index coe_sort_finset_basis_index
coe_finset_basis_index:
@[simp]
theorem coe_finset_basis_index [IsNoetherian K V] : (↑(finsetBasisIndex K V) : Set V) = Basis.ofVectorSpaceIndex K V :=
  Set.Finite.coe_toFinset _
#align coe_finset_basis_index coe_finset_basis_index
